commands.title: Create Presentation

appDefinitions.longDescription:
Presentations.AI revolutionizes the way you create presentations, making it effortless to produce visually stunning and impactful results. With our AI-powered technology, you can instantly design presentations that stand out and make you look exceptional.

Experience freedom from traditional design constraints. Presentations.AI is the first tool that eliminates the need for design skills, allowing you to create professional-quality presentations in half the time. Our advanced AI technology and best-in-class design practices ensure beautiful results with minimal effort.

Transform your workflow with a single touch, turning hours of work into mere seconds. Presentations.AI not only makes your tasks easier but also more enjoyable, guiding you to perfect results every time. Deliver presentations that make a lasting impact and drive business success with ease.

Presentations.AI also enables you to retrieve your created presentation documents by name within the Copilot for Microsoft 365 ecosystem. Instantly access and share them using natural language commands, such as:
'Fetch my presentation titled `Sales Meeting` from Presentations.ai.'

Please contact us at support@presentations.ai if you need further information, encounter any objectionable AI-generated content, or have any questions.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Instantly create and design stunning presentations with zero effort.

appDefinitions.longDescription:
Embark is an AI-powered solution designed to transform your employee learning experience by automatically creating micro-learning Courses. Simply upload one or more documents, and Embark will intelligently split the content into bite-sized Modules, convert them into engaging micro-learning videos, and schedule their delivery over multiple weeks.

This approach ensures that learners can absorb new information gradually, improving retention and engagement. To reinforce learning, Embark includes periodic trivia assessments, helping learners stay on track and solidify their understanding as they progress.

For more challenging topics, Embark provides a Chat interface that acts as a learning assistant. Learners can ask questions and receive detailed, context-aware answers based on the training content, offering additional support when they need it most.

**Features**
Embark is a learning-focussed solution that can:
- Automatically create micro-learning courses by uploading one or more documents. The documents are split into bite-sized modules and converted into micro-learning videos
- Course content is delivered over multiple weeks to ensure gradual learning and retention.
- Generate engaging activities like Trivia, Bingo, and Scavenger Hunts to make learning fun and interactive.
- Provide a Chat Assistant that helps learners explore and understand difficult topics by answering questions based on the uploaded content.
- Deliver periodic trivia assessments to reinforce learning and measure progress over time.
- Provide detailed knowledge gap analysis to help identify areas where learners need additional support or focus.
In one click, you get Courses, Chatbot, Activities, Multi-media, and Analytics â€” all working to ensure your employees have the best learning experience while improving knowledge retention. Embark also manages different types of events, including hosted, self-paced, and task-based checklists, and integrates with your Outlook calendar to manage schedules and highlight conflicts.

**Getting Started**.
- It's free to get started. Please watch the [video tutorials](https://www.embark.us/support/embark-help-videos) for tips.
- No registration required, but you'll need an active Microsoft Teams account
- For corporate subscriptions, please [schedule a demo](https://www.embark.us/schedule-a-demo)

**Works in Microsoft 365 Copilot**
With our latest release, you can
- See the learning progress for a particular employee. Sample Prompt: Has Jane Doe completed all her assigned courses
- Get the list of available courses for a given role or topic. Sample Prompt: Show me the courses that are available for a Software Engineer

**Works in Teams Meetings**
- Embed the app in any meeting, and when you launch the event, Embark will open in collaboration mode.

**Works as a personal app in Microsoft 365**
- Just like in the Embark web app, you can access it within Microsoft 365 and enjoy all the features.

**Compose Extension in Microsoft Outlook**
- Search for the learning progress or an employee or look for your course assignments

**Support**
- Learn more at: [https://www.embark.us](https://www.embark.us)
- We understand your security concerns: [https://security.herm.is](https://security.herm.is)
- We respect your privacy: [Privacy policy](https://www.herm.is/legal/privacy)
- Report any inappropriate content [here](https://www.embark.us/contact)
- [Contact us](https://www.embark.us/contact) for any questions.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Transform Documents into Micro-Learning Experiences with AI in One Click

appDefinitions.name: Tikit Virtual Agent TEST
appDefinitions.longDescription: Tikit Virtual Agent for Microsoft Teams elevates the end user support experience by providing real-time access to all their service desk needs, without needing to leave Teams. Tikit Virtual Agent empowers employees to help themselves through AI-powered ticket deflection, predefined templates to expedite IT requests and easy-to-use functionality enabling them to create, engage with and view all service desk tickets direct in Teams. In using the Tikit Virtual Agent, end users benefit from reduced ticket resolution times, increased likelihood of adoption due to ease of use and no need for adoption of another system as Tikit Virtual Agent works directly in Teams with your existing M365 investment. The use of Tikit Virtual Agent benefits both the end user and the IT analyst by reducing the need for unnecessary calls or confusion throughout the resolution process as attachments, images and screenshots can be directly added to a ticket all within Teams. While Tikit is specific to the IT analyst and those associated with the service desk experience in an organization, Tikit Virtual Agent is intended for all employees in an organization regardless of industry or department. Any employee who may have any IT related requests or issues needing resolution should use Tikit Virtual Agent.  Going mobile? Because Tikit Virtual Agent is a Microsoft Teams application, it works where you work and is accessible directly in the Teams mobile app.  Tikit Virtual Agent serves to meet all your end users? ticketing needs while improving the employee experience and enhancing efficiencies for the service desk team. In order to use this app, users must have an active Tikit account, please contact our support team for more details at Help@tikit.ai
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Intelligent Conversational Self Service for Tikit

appDefinitions.longDescription:
What if you could update your CRM while staying productive using the power of Microsoft 365 applications? 

Microsoft Viva Sales is a seller experience application that enables sellers to use Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Teams to automatically capture customer engagement data. As sellers are working in their productivity applications, they can get actionable insights about their customers and enrich a customer record with all the relevant customer activity data that can easily be shared with team members in the flow of work without going into the CRM. Viva Sales brings everything sellers need to engage with customers right inside the solutions they use every day while eliminating manual data entry and keeping CRM systems such as Dynamics 365 Sales and SalesforceÂ® CRM up to date with automatic write back of key customer information. 

Viva Sales helps fulfil the seller wish list and automates CRM updates, tracks customer sentiment, and even generates AI driven call summaries. Say goodbye to manual meeting notes! Help your sellers do what they do best and build deeper customer relationships and close deals.  Enable sellers to sell their way! 

This application requires additional setup in Viva Sales for Microsoft Outlook as a prerequisite. By using this app, you allow it to read online meeting artifacts on behalf of the signed-in user. 

A Microsoft 365 Global Administrator is required to install and set up Viva Sales. 

Viva Sales may be subject to an additional free or paid license. For more details, please access the Viva Sales website or contact your Microsoft representative.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Microsoft Viva Sales automates data entry and brings AI to sellers.

appDefinitions.name: AgilePolly
appDefinitions.longDescription: AgilePolly automates standups and check-ins while enabling your teams to be more effective and engaged by tracking status updates and detecting team blockers. Daily stand-ups as a commonly used Scrum and Agile product development practice has proven effective in optimizing team collaboration and performance. Using AgilePolly, you can author, deliver, automate and run asynchronous daily status meetings, weekly retrospectives, and one-on-one checkins while staying up-to-date with real-time progress.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Automate your daily standups and team check-ins with AgilePolly

commands.description: Collaborate on PDFs with your team
commands.title: Collaborate on PDF

appDefinitions.longDescription:
With Adobe Acrobat, you can now increase productivity with generative AI and collaborate on and make changes to your PDFs right from within Microsoft Teams, Outlook and Microsoft 365 (Office).
 For instance, the PDFs from your Microsoft Teams Chats, OneDrive etc. are now centrally available to open directly within the Teams environment to analyze and surface insights, and  make changes like organizing pages, compressing, converting to other formats, protecting, and more! You can collaborate with others in your Teams Channel and collect feedback in a single PDF so reviewers can see each otherâ€™s comments and it is easier to reconcile feedback and get things done. Notifications keep you informed when others take action on shared documents.
 Tenant admins can set Adobe Acrobat app as the default PDF viewer in Teams by setting a policy on Teams Admin Center to install the app on user's client. Instructions on how to do this are available [here](https://www.adobe.com/go/acroteams_fh_help).
**Free-to-use features:**
- High quality viewing â€” Acrobat lets you open high-fidelity PDFs directly within Microsoft Teams, Outlook and Microsoft 365 (Office), for a satisfying and seamless work experience.
- Streamline PDF review - Collect channel membersâ€™ feedback in a single PDF directly in Teams instead of gathering and reconciling feedback via multiple attachments. This feature requires users to have an Adobe account.*
- Keep reviewers informed â€” Reviewers get notified when others reply to their comments. 
- Secure collaboration â€” Collaborate securely with trusted members and retain the ability to store document versions in Microsoft SharePoint or OneDrive.**
**Premium features (require Acrobat subscription):**
- If you do not have an existing Acrobat subscription, subscribe now to unlock these features right within Acrobat in Teams, Outlook and Microsoft 365 (Office).
 - Convert PDFs to Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, or Image
 - Combine multiple documents and file types into one PDF file
 - Delete, rotate, extract, insert or reorder pages of a PDF
 - Reduce the size of your PDF for easier sharing
 - Add a password to protect your PDF.
**Acrobat AI Assistant features which requires [AI Assistant add-on]( https://www.adobe.com/acrobat/generative-ai-pdf.html#compare-plans):**
 AI Assistant for Adobe Acrobat is a conversational feature that lets you interact with your documents to get quick answers to questions based on your PDF   content in a comprehensive and informative way.
 - Insights you can trust â€“ AI Assistant looks only at the documents you tell it to. And by generating verifiable insights with attributions back to the source, you can be assured youâ€™re accessing credible information.
 - Writing made easy â€“ Empower your team to rapidly create high-quality professional content for emails, blogs, presentations, research summaries, and more. Use the responses AI Assistant generated from your documents to get the write-up you need and produce your deliverables in less time.
 - Enhanced meeting transcript support â€“ Whether you are leading a meeting, participating, or missed it altogether, enhanced meeting transcript support will help you stay in the know and turn meeting insights into takeaway actions. Automatically generate meeting summaries from transcripts to understand main topics, key points, and action items.
** Commenting currently is not supported on the mobile experience.
** Learn more about security for Acrobat [here](https://www.adobe.com/content/dam/cc/en/trust-center/ungated/whitepapers/doc-cloud/acrobat-dc-security-overview-ue.pdf).
** AI Assistant is currently available in English only.
 The app utilizes the 'onMessageAttachmentsChanged' launch event to improve email collaboration. Specifically, it detects when a PDF is attached to an email and prompts users to convert the PDF into a shareable Adobe Document Cloud public link.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Gain insights, edit, convert, and collaborate on PDFs in Microsoft Teams

commands.description: Configure your Confluence for Teams settings
commands.title: Configure

appDefinitions.longDescription:
Confluence is the dynamic, remote-friendly team workspace where knowledge and collaboration seamlessly converge. It's the ultimate hub for your team's collective wisdom and project brilliance. Whether you're creating, organizing, searching, or sharing content, Confluence empowers you to work harmoniously from anywhere on the globe.

**Why Choose Confluence for Microsoft Teams**

Elevate your collaboration game with the Confluence Cloud app, seamlessly blending conversation within Microsoft Teams with the collaborative prowess and adaptive organization of Confluence.

Discover a world of features and benefits that enhance your teamwork:

**Access Information in a Flash:**
- Add Confluence pages as tabs to any channel, effortlessly view, edit, and comment on content right from Teams.
- Customize Confluence notifications in Teams to stay in the loop about updates to pages and spaces you're connected to.
- Search and share Confluence pages from the Teams chat messaging extension.
- Adaptive link cards provide a quick overview of relevant page details.

**Effortless Documentation and Sharing:**
- When notes are published to Confluence, meeting attendees are identified, notes are automatically formatted, and action items are seamlessly organized.
- Instantly access shared meeting notes within the Teams chat using a post-meeting adaptive card.

**Streamlined Organization:**
- Meeting notes are automatically sorted by time and date, creating a tidy 'Microsoft Teams Notes' page tree in Confluence.

**More Productive meetings**
- Collaborate as a team with a Confluence notes panel right within your Teams meeting window.
- Create, edit, and publish content to any Confluence space without leaving your Teams meeting.
- Harness the power of Confluence macros to make notes more digestible and actionable, with options like action items, decisions, code snippets, mentions, tables, and more.

Unleash a seamless, interconnected flow of information within your team by merging the ultimate productivity hub, Teams, with Confluence, your remote-friendly team workspace.

**What's New - Confluence for Microsoft Outlook and Copilot:**
- Search for pages and effortlessly share them via email, right from Microsoft Outlook.
- Retrieve and view Confluence pages using Microsoft Copilot. Simply start by saying, 'Fetch Confluence pages updated by me'.

**Availability**

To harness the full potential of Confluence for Microsoft Teams, ensure you have an active Confluence account. Be sure to have your administrator enable the Confluence app for your Microsoft Teams account.

**Add-in Capabilities**

When this add-in is used, it
- Can send data over the Internet.
- This add-in can access personal information on the active message, such as phone numbers, postal addresses, or URLs. The add-in may send this data to a third-party service. Other items in your mailbox canâ€™t be read or modified.

New to Confluence? [Sign up for free](https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence?utm_source=partner-marketplace&utm_medium=comarketing&utm_campaign=P:marketplace*O:ecosystem*F:consideration*C:ptour*H:fy22q1*I:msteams-conf-launch*)

**Additional resources**

[Documentation](https://confluence.atlassian.com/confkb/use-microsoft-teams-and-confluence-together-1079345180.html)

[See all Atlassian + Microsoft Teams integrations](https://www.atlassian.com/software/marketplace/microsoft?utm_source=partner-marketplace&utm_medium=comarketing&utm_campaign=P:marketplace*O:ecosystem*F:consideration*C:demo*H:fy22q1*I:msteams-conf-launch*)
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Capture rich meeting notes, share pages, & stay up-to-date with Confluence Cloud

appDefinitions.name: Polly_test

commands.description: Create a polly from this message
commands.title: Create a Polly

appDefinitions.longDescription:
Polly is an engagement app that captures instant, contextual feedback from your team in seconds. Just about anyone can get started with Polly to quickly reach their colleagues and make data-driven decisions instantly.
You can use Polly to get meeting feedback, quiz your students, get a pulse on how your team is feeling, and so much more. Polly offers an array of advanced functionality such as templates, recurrence, scheduling, anonymity, and more all available to you in Microsoft Teams.
To get started, add Polly to a Team of your choice, and you can start creating your first polly by using the messaging extension or pinning Polly to the Team tab.
For Teams Meetings, just add Polly to the Meeting tab to start creating your polly ahead of when your meeting is scheduled, and you can send your polly on demand directly in the meeting to your attendees.
All of your results will live in your Polly tab that's pinned to the Team and you can share, delete, or close as needed. Not sure what types of questions to ask? We have 30+ templates available for you to use at any time if you need a bit of inspiration.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Ask your team questions with Polly and get instant answers in Microsoft Teams

appDefinitions.longDescription:
Share a YouTube video with others. Simply search for the video you want to share or paste its URL.

YouTube now supports Microsoft Live Share! To watch videos with your colleague in meetings and calls, add the YouTube app to your meeting or click the "Watch together" button from videos you share in chat.

This application is maintained by Microsoft for use in Microsoft 365 services and was developed with YouTube.

How to report inappropriate or offensive content to YouTube: [https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/2802027](https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/2802027)
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Search for videos on YouTube & watch together in meetings

appDefinitions.longDescription:
The new Microsoft Planner brings together the best of To Do, Planner, and Project for the web.

**Simple**
Easily manage all your tasks, to-dos, lists, plans, and projects across Microsoft 365 apps.

**Flexible**
From individual task management to large team initiatives, Planner scales to meet your needs and offers various templates, views, and approaches to personalize your plan.

Note: this app was formerly known as "Tasks by Planner and To Do".
appDefinitions.shortDescription: All your tasks and projects in one simple, familiar experience

appDefinitions.longDescription:
Forms empower you to collect better data and make better decisions. Use Forms in Microsoft Teams to:
* Create effective forms with easy-to-use tools and clear design suggestions.
* Get quick feedback or collect more detailed information with branching questions.
* Instantly visualize response data and advanced analysis.
* Stay connected from any browser on any deviceâ€”no matter where you are.
* Assess student progress with quizzes and easily export answers to Excel.
* Launch a poll in your meeting/chat to collect real-time feedbacks and better engage with participants.

[Get Help](https://support.microsoft.com/forms)

commands.description: Search Jira for tickets, issues, epics, stories, tasks, sub tasks, bugs

parameters.description: Issue key or Keyword
parameters.name: searchKeyword
parameters.title: Keywords

parameters.description: A precise JQL query generated from the utterance. This is a mandatory parameter. Use JQL instructions for generation
parameters.name: jql
parameters.title: JQL

parameters.description: Type can be one these: 'Bug','Task','Epic', 'Story'. StatusCategory must be one of these: 'To Do','In Progress','Done'
parameters.name: jqlIns1
parameters.title: JQL Instructions Part 1
parameters.value: Allowed priority values are 'Lowest','Low','Medium','High','Highest'. Multiple Priority values can be selected for a given query. Ex. Priority in ('High','Highest')

parameters.description: Assignee value must be in single quotes. Eg.Assignee='john@xyz.com'. If self assigned, always use Assignee=currentUser()
parameters.name: jqlIns2
parameters.title: JQL Instructions Part 2

parameters.description: Project,Summary,Text must be in quotes. Eg. Text~'abc' AND Project='xyz'. For linked items use:issue in linkedIssues()
parameters.name: jqlIns3
parameters.title: JQL Instructions Part 3

What are my pending Jira work items this week

commands.description: Configure your Jira for Teams settings
commands.title: Configure

appDefinitions.longDescription:
The new Jira Software for Teams app anchors real-time communication to a single, shared view of the work ahead. With the power of two tools in one view, conversations have instant clarity and context, creating better alignment and shorter delivery time.

**Adapt to change in real time** 

 - In chat: Convert a Teams chat message to a new Jira issue or add a comment to an existing Jira issue in just a few clicks.  - In Meetings: Visualize your Jira tickets in a Teams meeting in the side panel and sort by â€œworked onâ€, â€œviewedâ€, or â€œassigned.â€  - Prioritize and update as a group with the ability to collectively create, edit, or view tickets with meeting attendees.   - View your tickets directly from Teams personal tab, Outlook or Microsoft 365.  - Retrieve and view Jira issues using Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365. Simply start by saying, 'Fetch issues assigned to me'. 

**The notifications you want, where you work**

- Receive customizable Jira notifications in Teams with personal notifications.- Choose when you want to be notified depending on tickets you report, are assigned to, are mentioned on, or are watching.

**Collaborate with one source of truth**

- Easily create a central view of Jira issues in Teams by adding a tab to a team or channel and selecting a Jira filter.- In the tab, you can view and edit existing issues and create new issues.

**Bring context to the conversation for instant clarity**

- Search Jira or view recent Jira issues directly from a Teams chat or a new Outlook mail, so you can stay focused on the context at-hand.- Include multiple Jira tickets in a message, which will expand into digestible link cards.- Improved link cards show ticket title, project, status, and assignee.

The Jira Cloud for Microsoft Teams app is built for Jira Software, but also works with Jira Service Management and Jira Work Management.

New to Jira? [Sign up for free](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira?utm_source=partner-marketplace&utm_medium=comarketing&utm_campaign=P:marketplace*O:ecosystem*F:consideration*C:ptour*H:fy22q2*I:msteams-jira-launch*)

**Additional resources**

[See all Atlassian + Microsoft Teams integrations](https://www.atlassian.com/software/marketplace/microsoft?utm_source=product-release&utm_medium=mpac-listing&utm_campaign=P:marketplace*O:ecosystem*F:consideration*C:demo*W:jira-ms-bom*H:fy22q2*I:msteams-jira-launch*)

[Jira Cloud for Microsoft Teams App Demo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YM7eqE89MnY)
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Empower your team to track, update, and manage projects from Microsoft Teams.

appDefinitions.name: Box_test
appDefinitions.longDescription: The Box for Microsoft Teams integration helps businesses of all sizes securely manage and collaborate on content to drive more productive teamwork. Easily access and edit all of your Box content from Microsoft Teams and view contextual information on shared files with rich content cards in chats. Your content remains centralized in Box, but quickly available where collaboration happens in Microsoft Teams. For more information, please review our [support page](https://support.box.com/hc/en-us/articles/360044667034-Introducing-Box-for-Microsoft-Teams). An active Box account is required to use this app, please [Click here](https://www.box.com/cloud-content-management) to sign up for Box.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Your content securely extended to Microsoft Teams

appDefinitions.name: Kudos_test
appDefinitions.longDescription: Kudos is the fun and effective solution for boosting morale, employee engagement and teamwork in your organization! Kudos for Teams connects your recognition messages in the Kudos web app with your interactions in MS Teams.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Send and receive Kudos recognition from within Teams.

commands.description: Easily submit an update using a compose message extension
commands.title: Submit update

appDefinitions.longDescription: Updates in Microsoft Teams is an app that saves people time and energy by helping them create, submit, and review all their updates right in the flow of work. Whether those are recurring processes that happen on a regular basis or in the moment updates that might be needed at any time, Updates makes it easy for you to manage these all in one place.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Easily submit, create, and review employee updates in Microsoft Teams

appDefinitions.name: Praise_test
appDefinitions.longDescription: Recognize your colleaguesâ€™ contributions using the praise messaging extension from Microsoft Viva Insights. Easily access the praise feature within Microsoft Teams, choose a celebratory badge, add an optional message, and share gratitude within the flow of work. Praise badges can be sent in a private chat or posted to Teams channels for wider visibility.
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Show gratitude for your peers.

appDefinitions.longDescription:
Easily create choice polls, quizzes and word cloud polls before or during your meeting. Collect responses in real-time.

[Get Started](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2270227) | [Get Help](https://support.microsoft.com/forms)
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Easily create polls with your team in Microsoft Teams

Standup.ly - Poll & Survey Bot TEST
appDefinitions.longDescription:
Standup Bot for daily async meetings. Automation for Agile events, HR processes and development workflows. Trusted by 100,000 teams from Intel, IBM, Adobe, and more.

ðŸ”¥ **Hot Features** ðŸ”¥:

âš’ï¸ **Automate** daily huddle check-ins, retrospectives, 360 feedback reviews, 1-on-1, planning poker, backlog grooming, and other workflows.

âœ… Manage personal To-Dos and team tasks.

âš™ï¸ **Centralized account management and insights** hub, organization-wide controls to onboard, easily manage and adopt usage for the whole organization.

ðŸ“… Run multiple reports on a schedule or asynchronously at **usersâ€™ time zones**.

ðŸ’¬ Customize questions using **your language** to support and improve team culture.

âœðŸ» **Track** work progress, business metrics, obstacles and team happiness **24x7**.

ðŸ“Š **Integrated** with popular task tracker and other team tools to enrich reports with external data to provide more progress visibility.

ðŸ“¥ **Extract data** from your own Data Bases and share a key metrics with the team and stakeholders.

**Built for Remote Teams - Designed for the Enterprise**:
- get productivity summary reports in Microsoft Teams (DM/channel), via email or on the web;
- track business metrics & OKR, teamâ€™s progress, performance and happiness;
- share goals, to-do lists with tasks, status meeting notes, calendar agenda, run polls, brainstorm;
- share permissions with your team using multi-admin access.

**Your Digital Assistant for Project Management in Microsoft Teams**

Think of Standuply as a Scrum Master or Project Manager that works in thousands of teams and applies the best practices.
As a result, your Agile or Kanban processes run on autopilot, you save time and avoid costly mistakes.

Welcome to Standuply! Whether you're new or experienced, our user-friendly app offers a seamless sign-up process, a ["Get Started" guide](https://help.standuply.com/en/collections/1571862-how-to-start-using-standuply) for easy onboarding, and quick access to support through our ["Contact Us"](mailto:hello@standuply.com) link. Also, read the [best practices](https://standuply.com/blog/top-10-standuply-product-adoption-tips/?utm_source=beamer&utm_medium=sidebar&utm_campaign=Standuply-Adoption-Tips&utm_content=textlink/) picked from the champions of Standuply. Need assistance? Our comprehensive ["Help Center"](http://help.standuply.com) has you covered. Join us on a journey of improving teams' productivity!
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Enhance standup meetings, retrospectives, ToDo plans, 20+ Agile & HR workflows
